Package com.intellij.openapi.components

Interface ComponentManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AreaInstance, Disposable, UserDataHolder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Application, ApplicationEx, Module, ModuleEx, Project, ProjectEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationImpl, CoreModule, DummyProject, MockApplication, MockApplicationEx, MockComponentManager, MockProject, ModuleImpl, ProjectImpl

    public interface ComponentManager
extends UserDataHolder, Disposable, AreaInstance
    Provides access to components. Serves as a base interface for Application and Project.
    See Also:
    ProjectComponent, Application, Project

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.Disposable

        Disposable.Parent

      • getComponent

        <T> T getComponent(java.lang.Class<T> interfaceClass)
        Gets the component by its interface class.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - the interface class of the component
        Returns:
        component that matches interface class or null if there is no such component

      • getComponent

default <T> T getComponent(java.lang.Class<T> interfaceClass,

        Deprecated. Useless.

      • hasComponent

        default boolean hasComponent(java.lang.Class<?> interfaceClass)
        Checks whether there is a component with the specified interface class.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - interface class of component to be checked
        Returns:
        true if there is a component with the specified interface class; false otherwise

      • getComponents

        @Deprecated
default <T> T [] getComponents(java.lang.Class<T> baseClass)
        Deprecated. use extension points instead
        Gets all components whose implementation class is derived from baseClass.

      • getPicoContainer

      • getMessageBus

        MessageBus getMessageBus()
        See Also:
        com.intellij.application.Topics#subscribe

      • isDisposed

        boolean isDisposed()
        Returns:
        true when this component is disposed (e.g. the "File|Close Project" invoked or the application is exited) or is about to be disposed (e.g. the ProjectImpl.dispose() was called but not completed yet)
        The result is only valid inside read action because the application/project/module can be disposed at any moment. (see more details on read actions)

      • isDisposedOrDisposeInProgress

        @Deprecated
default boolean isDisposedOrDisposeInProgress()
        Deprecated. Use isDisposed() instead

      • getExtensions

        @Deprecated
default <T> T [] getExtensions(ExtensionPointName<T> extensionPointName)
        Deprecated. Use ExtensionPointName.getExtensionList(AreaInstance)

      • getDisposed

        Condition<?> getDisposed()
        Returns:
        condition for this component being disposed. see Application.invokeLater(Runnable, Condition) for the usage example.
